name: Aardium
description: A minimal Electron app for Aardvark

scripts.dist-linux64: electron-packager . Aardium --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon ./aardvark.png --out dist --overwrite && cd dist/Aardium-linux-x64 && tar -zcvf ../Aardium-Linux-x64.tar.gz .
scripts.dist-darwin64: electron-packager . Aardium --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon ./aardvark.icns --out dist --overwrite && cd dist/Aardium-darwin-x64 && tar -zcvf ../Aardium-Darwin-x64.tar.gz .
scripts.dist: yarn dist-win64 && yarn dist-linux64 && yarn dist-darwin64
scripts.zip: yarn dist && folder-zip-sync dist/Aardium-win32-x64 dist/Aardium-win32-x64.zip && folder-zip-sync dist/Aardium-linux-x64 dist/Aardium-linux-x64.zip
